title: The resolutions of the army, against the King, kingdome and city. Iuly 15. 1648. at 8 of the clocke in the morning.
author: Croplie, Thomas.
notes: Signed at end: Testified by Thomas Croplie. Richard Hide.
Sometimes incorrectly attributed to John Dias.
Identified at reel 1775:25 as Wing D1380A ("no entry" in Wing 2nd ed., rev.).
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Harvard University Library (Early English Books).
